Statute.Title: Cree Nation of Eeyou Istchee Governance Agreement Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Accord concernant la gouvernance de la nation crie d’Eeyou Istchee, Loi sur l’)

Minister.Text: Introduced by Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development

General.Text: General, 2018, c. 4, ss. 7 and 8 (Cree Constitution) and 10 to 12 (application of certain Acts)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2018, c. 4, s. 1 (ss. 1 to 25) in force on assent 29.03.2018
